article.title: SAIC Awarded $20 Million Task Order by NSWC-Crane Division
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a task order by the Naval Surface Warfare Center (NSWC)-Crane Division to provide engineering, technical and management support to the Wheeled Tactical Vehicle Support Shelter and Vehicle Automated Diagnostic System program initiatives. The contract has a total value of more than $20 million if all options are exercised.
